mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM NUM, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE_VIEW WHERE EMP_NAME LIKE #{query} AND DEPT_CODE LIKE #{department} AND EMP_YN='N' ORDER BY DEPT_CODE) A ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN 1 + (#{page} - 1 ) * 10 AND #{page} * 10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_YN='N'
select * from employee e left outer join job j on (e.job_code=j.job_code) left outer join department d on (e.dept_code=d.dept_code) where emp_yn='N'
select * from employee e left outer join job j on (e.job_code=j.job_code) left outer join department d on (e.dept_code=d.dept_code) where emp_yn='N' and emp_no=#{empNO}
SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE JOIN JOB J ON E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE WHERE EMP_YN = 'N'

SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN JOB J ON E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE JOIN APPROVAL A ON E.EMP_NO = A.APPROVAL_M_NO WHERE A.APPROVAL_NO = #{ano} AND A.APPROVAL_M_NO = #{mno}

SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN JOB J ON E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE JOIN APPROVAL A ON E.EMP_NO = A.APPROVAL_F_NO WHERE A.APPROVAL_NO = #{ano} AND A.APPROVAL_F_NO = #{fno}

SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN JOB J ON E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE JOIN APPROVAL A ON E.EMP_NO = A.WRITER_NO WHERE A.APPROVAL_NO = #{ano} AND A.WRITER_NO = #{wno}
